product_name: Mountain Hardwear Frequentor Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether you're stuck in the office or sneaking out for a day hike, the Mountain Hardwear Frequenter Shirt features an advanced Dri-release(R) fabric that wicks moisture and dries fast. Polyester/wool blend not only wicks and dries fast, it also helps minimize odors to keep you feeling fresh when you're on the go. Chest pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you're stuck in the office or sneaking out for a day hike, the Mountain Hardwear Frequenter Shirt features an advanced Dri-release(R) fabric that wicks moisture and dries fast.
